p: The abundance of species within each conservatism class showed markedly different qualitative patterns over time ( Fig 6), and each conservatism class except C = 1–3 changed significantly from 1986 to 2019 ( Table 3; Figs 6 and 7). Finally, regarding non-native species, the 1985–86 plant sample contained 10 non-native species, with cumulative sum cover of 414, while the 2019 sample contained only one, with sum cover of 6 ( S2 Table).
